name: Siroco Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a 2 week stay..............
reviews.title: brill location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: room cleaned everyday.
reviews.title: Return visit - Excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: stayed half board, food nothing special if you love fish you will be fine.
reviews.title: good value hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: STAFF VERY RUDE.
reviews.title: great hotel and excellent value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: got bitten by mozzies everyday, hotel has a problem with them, cleaners carry a massive tin of spray around with them.
reviews.title: Very Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: I was annoyed to say the least when I found out the check out was at 10am. For most of the hotels in the region it around 12 so when your flight back home is at 6pm that is a long time to be clicking your heels. That said the hotel was clean and smart with beautiful spacious gardens and plenty of pool space. The food was very fresh and tasty. The downside was the drinks service, out of 5 nights I was offered a drink only twice and even then on one occasion the drink did not materialize, it was not even busy. Still, a decent three star hotel in a very good location for the beach and bars etc. (Providing you are on an earlyish flight out!)
reviews.title: 10 am check out, please note!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stay at this Hotel twice a year and we have never complained. This vacation turned out to be a nightmare which left my wife and I scarred for life.
reviews.title: 5th Floor is very dangerous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked in 7th May and departed 17th. We were allocated a roor room which was directly on the roof space opposite the giant neon which say`s Siroco.
reviews.title: good value.and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will not say what happened around 4 am in the early hours of Monday morning as one day you will find out.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you ever book a room in this hotel, make sure you do not occupy a room on the 5th floor. There are only 5 rooms in this location, all are dangerous.
reviews.title: Unwelcoming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from another March visit to Siroco.
reviews.title: Still great value Hotel. No frills. Good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing much changed. If anything slightly less choice at mealtimes although as always there was still plenty to go round. Quality still reasonable and that huge pig farm in Spain continues its endless supply of meat.
reviews.title: benalmadena just fantastic siroco grate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would say that hotel was busier than I've seen it in March in 5 years of visiting. Dining room got busy at times but never a problem getting a table.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay, had a great holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Poolside also very busy but again plenty loungers to go around. Still sunbathing weather at 6.00pm. Can't be bad.
reviews.title: Better inside than outside

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: As usual, gave the entertainment a miss. Usual cheesy stuff - snake show, parrot show, magician, singer and Jose and his amazing organ.
reviews.title: Excellent value hotel for low season with good food. Hotel very clean if a little tired looking.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived to a nice welcome on the Thursday AM, room available and cleaned. Every thing you may need in the bathroom was supplied. Gardens are lovely, but beware of the mosquitos around the carp ponds and rooms above. Nice day Thursday and Friday, but on Saturday to our horror - a hundred and odd German students on a half break bender appeared.
reviews.title: Beware the mossies and the 18 - 30 german students in school holidays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Music, noise and drunkeness 24/7 from then on. 2 with megaphones all night - All staff then appeared to speak Spanish only so couldn't/wouldn't deal with complaints. Corridors and stairwells full of students bin the mornings fast asleep. pool no go area seems we holidayed with an 18 - 30 hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent customer service and good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked hotel via Booking.com we made a huge mistake by double booking this hotel. Could have been charged for a NO SHOW for 6 nights but the staff at the Siroco and the guys at booking.com helped us sort out the mess. They went further at the Siroco and upgraded our stay free of charge at the 4star Trinton with a fine sea view room. So thanks guys you made our holiday.
reviews.title: Worth 2 star rating for rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great swimming pools, wonderful gardens. The room we were given at first faced a concrete wall & was over the laundry room- terrible noise from 7 am to 7 pm. After complaining we were moved to another room. The air con did not work, the shower was broken, the balcony door handle/ lock was just hanging down & the bathroom was so small you had to hang your legs in the bath to sit on the toilet! Pigeons mess on the balcony table & chairs was not cleaned off all week. No drawers to put clothes, etc. People at reception had little English. If you hire a car the hotel will charge you 6 euro a day for parking! The town itself was kept very clean
reviews.title: Mossie City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I have just returned from this hotel and I am covered in Mossie bites. The hotel is full of them. We were out and about during the day and we did not encounter any mossies elsewhere but if you value your skin DO NOT STAY HERE. I have 27 lumps on my arms and legs and my husband has even more. ....
reviews.title: Good hotel for the price (but watch out for mosquitoes)

description: The Siroco hotel is located at the tourist center of Benalmadena, at 200m from the beach (which is accessible through an underground tunnel) and the marina.
